repairedDockerfile:
FROM        debian:8
MAINTAINER  V

RUN apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y

# RUN apt-get -qy install language-pack-en
ENV LANGUAGE en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8
#RUN locale-gen en_US.UTF-8
#RUN dpkg-reconfigure locales

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN curl -f -L https://www.opscode.com/chef/install.sh | bash

RUN mkdir -p /root/.ssh && chown root:root /root/.ssh && chmod 755 /root/.ssh
RUN echo 'ssh-rsa  vagrant insecure public key' > /root/.ssh/authorized_keys
RUN chmod 0644 /root/.ssh/authorized_keys && chown root:root /root/.ssh/authorized_keys

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y openssh-server && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN mkdir /var/run/sshd

EXPOSE 22
CMD ["/usr/sbin/sshd", "-D"]
